statement: The act of users downloading, using, or distributing this font package on their own is deemed to be a complete understanding and voluntary assumption of all legal responsibilities and potential risks arising therefrom. This statement shall come into effect from the date the user obtains the font package and shall not be invalidated by subsequent updates to the project.
